description: [WhisperGate](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0689) can download additional payloads hosted on a Discord channel.(Citation: Crowdstrike WhisperGate January 2022)(Citation: Unit 42 WhisperGate January 2022)(Citation: Microsoft WhisperGate January 2022)(Citation: Cisco Ukraine Wipers January 2022)(Citation: Medium S2W WhisperGate January 2022)
